TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MsmqMessage`1<T> extends System.Object
generic <typename T> public ref class MsmqMessage sealed

span.span: Represents the message body.

summary.span: 類別會封裝訊息佇列 (MSMQ) 訊息，而此訊息是在訊息佇列整合通道上往返於現有訊息佇列應用程式之間傳送和接收的訊息。

span.span: The class encapsulates aMessage Queuing (MSMQ) message that is sent and received, over a Message Queuing integration channel, to and from an existing Message Queuing application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 類別，即可存取訊息佇列訊息的屬性。Use the class to access the properties of the Message Queuing message. ## Examples [!code-csharp[UEMsmqMessage#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/uemsmqmessage/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[UEMsmqMessage#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/uemsmqmessage/vb/program.vb#1)]

span.span: Message body is null.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會指定傳送應用程式所要求之認可訊息的類型。This property specifies the type of acknowledgment messages that are requested by the sending application. 應用程式可以使用這個屬性來要求特定事件的通知。The application can use this property to request notification of certain events. 例如，應用程式可能想要接獲訊息何時抵達目的端佇列、訊息何時被擷取，或訊息是否在抵達目的端佇列或被擷取之前逾時的通知。For example, the application might want to be notified when the message reaches its destination queue, when the message is retrieved, or if the message times out before it reaches its destination queue or is retrieved. 如需成員的詳細資訊，請參閱 。For member details, see . ## Examples [!code-csharp[UEMsmqMessage#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/uemsmqmessage/cs/program.cs#3)] [!code-vb[UEMsmqMessage#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/uemsmqmessage/vb/program.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接收來自管理佇列的訊息時，您可以使用這個屬性來驗證原始訊息的狀態。When you receive a message from an administration queue, you can use this property to verify the status of the original message. ## Examples [!code-csharp[UEMsmqMessage#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/uemsmqmessage/cs/program.cs#4)] [!code-vb[UEMsmqMessage#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/uemsmqmessage/vb/program.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 與訊息相關聯的管理佇列將會收到任何指示原始訊息是否已抵達目的端佇列、以及是否已從佇列移除的認可訊息。The administration queue that is associated with a message will receive any acknowledgment messages that indicate whether the original message reached its destination queue and whether it has been removed from the queue. ## Examples [!code-csharp[UEMsmqMessage#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/uemsmqmessage/cs/program.cs#5)] [!code-vb[UEMsmqMessage#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/uemsmqmessage/vb/program.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當寄件者要求驗證，或將訊息傳送至設定成要求驗證的訊息佇列時，訊息就會進行驗證。A message is authenticated when the sender requests authentication or sends the message to a message queue that is configured to require authentication. ## Examples [!code-csharp[UEMsmqMessage#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/uemsmqmessage/cs/program.cs#8)] [!code-vb[UEMsmqMessage#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/uemsmqmessage/vb/program.vb#8)]

summary.span: 取得或設定 值，這個值會指出訊息的本文型別。

span.span: Gets or sets an value that indicates the type of the body of the message.

value.span: 值，這個值會指出訊息的本文型別。

span.span: An value that indicates the type of the body of the message.

value.span: 可以是 。

span.span: May be .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 訊息佇列 (MSMQ) 會將本文內容辨識為物件或已序列化的資料流。Message Queuing (MSMQ) recognizes the body contents as an object or as a serialized stream. `BodyType` 屬性會指出訊息之 Body 屬性內的物件型別。The `BodyType` property indicates the type of the object within the Body property of the message. ActiveX 格式器會執行原生型別和訊息本文中物件之間的繫結。The ActiveX formatter performs binding between native types and the object in a message body. 如果您使用 ActiveX 格式器，格式器會為您設定 `BodyType` 屬性。If you use the ActiveX formatter, the formatter sets the `BodyType` property for you. ## Examples [!code-csharp[UEMsmqMessage#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/uemsmqmessage/cs/program.cs#10)] [!code-vb[UEMsmqMessage#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/uemsmqmessage/vb/program.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ CorrelationId { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.CorrelationId : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定 ，其中包含這個訊息的相互關聯識別項。

span.span: Gets or sets a that contains the correlation identifier for this message.

value.span: ，其中包含這個訊息的相互關聯識別項。

span.span: A that contains the correlation identifier for this message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當訊息佇列 (MSMQ) 產生認可或報告訊息時，會使用這個屬性來指定原始訊息的訊息識別項。When Message Queuing (MSMQ) generates an acknowledgment or report message, it uses this property to specify the message identifier of the original message. 當傳送原始訊息的應用程式接收認可或報告訊息時，可以從所收到的訊息中取得這個屬性來驗證原始訊息的訊息識別項。The application that sent the original message, when it receives an acknowledgment or report message, can get this property from the message it receives to verify the message identifier of the original message. 應用程式也可以使用這個屬性，針對本身用途，使訊息相互關聯。The application can also use this property to correlate messages for its own purposes. ## Examples [!code-csharp[UEMsmqMessage#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/uemsmqmessage/cs/program.cs#11)] [!code-vb[UEMsmqMessage#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/uemsmqmessage/vb/program.vb#11)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Id As String
public: property System::String ^ Id { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 ，其中包含這個訊息的訊息識別項。

span.span: Gets a that contains the message identifier for this message.

value.span: ，其中包含這個訊息的訊息識別項。

span.span: A that contains the message identifier for this message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性只能在傳送訊息之後存取。This property can only be accessed after the message is sent. 訊息佇列 (MSMQ) 會在傳送訊息時產生該訊息的訊息識別項。Message Queuing (MSMQ) generates a message identifier for the message when it is sent. 識別項是由 20 個位元組所組成，並且包含兩個部分：傳送端電腦的電腦 GUID，以及傳送端電腦上唯一的訊息識別項。The identifier is composed of 20 bytes and includes two parts: the machine GUID of the sending computer, and a message identifier that is unique on the sending computer. 這兩個部分合併起來構成網路上唯一的訊息識別項。The combination of these two parts forms a message identifier that is unique on the network. 訊息佇列會產生所有訊息的訊息識別項，包括認可和報告訊息。Message Queuing generates message identifiers for all messages, including acknowledgment and report messages. 訊息佇列會傳送認可訊息，以當做應用程式所傳送訊息之抵達或失敗的回應。Message Queuing sends an acknowledgment message in response to the arrival or failure of a message that is sent by an application. ## Examples [!code-csharp[UEMsmqMessage#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/uemsmqmessage/cs/program.cs#14)] [!code-vb[UEMsmqMessage#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/uemsmqmessage/vb/program.vb#14)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Label { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Label : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定包含訊息標籤的 。

span.span: Gets or sets a that contains the message label.

value.span: 包含訊息標籤的 。

span.span: A that contains the message label.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 訊息標籤對於訊息佇列 (MSMQ) 並無任何實質意義。The message label has no intrinsic meaning to Message Queuing (MSMQ). 它是用來識別採用人們可讀取的 (Human-Readable) 格式的訊息。It is used to identify messages in a human-readable way. 您的應用程式要負責解譯訊息標籤。Your applications are responsible for interpreting message labels. 訊息標籤不需要成為唯一的。You do not need to make the message label unique. 您可以將訊息標籤用在各種用途，例如顯示標籤，或是選擇性地根據所含標籤來處理訊息。You can use the message label for various purposes, such as displaying it or selectively processing messages based on their labels. ## Examples [!code-csharp[UEMsmqMessage#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/uemsmqmessage/cs/program.cs#15)] [!code-vb[UEMsmqMessage#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/uemsmqmessage/vb/program.vb#15)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property MessageType As Nullable(Of MessageType)
public: property Nullable<System::Messaging::MessageType> MessageType { Nullable<System::Messaging::MessageType> get(); };

summary.span: 取得與此訊息相關聯的 。

span.span: Gets the that is associated with this message.

value.span: 與此訊息相關聯的 。

span.span: The that is associated with this message.

value.span: 可以是 。

span.span: May be .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 訊息佇列 (MSMQ) 會在傳送訊息時設定這個屬性。Message Queuing (MSMQ) sets this property when it sends a message. 訊息可以有下列其中一個類型：A message can have one of the following types: - ：應用程式傳送的訊息。: A message sent by an application. - ：當應用程式傳送一般訊息並要求認可時，訊息佇列所產生的訊息。: A message that Message Queuing generates when an application sends a normal message and requests an acknowledgment. 例如，訊息佇列可以產生正或負認可，指出原始訊息是否已抵達其目的端佇列，或是否已由接收應用程式從目的端佇列完成擷取。For example, Message Queuing can generate a positive or negative acknowledgment to indicate whether the original message arrived at its destination queue, or whether it was retrieved from the destination queue by the receiving application. 訊息佇列會將適當的認可訊息傳回給傳送應用程式所指定的管理佇列。Message Queuing returns the appropriate acknowledgment message to the administration queue specified by the sending application. - ：如果本機佇列管理員定義了報告佇列，則只要應用程式傳送訊息，訊息佇列就會產生報告訊息，並將它傳送至報告佇列。: Whenever an application sends a message, if the local Queue Manager has a report queue defined, Message Queuing generates a report message and sends it to the report queue. 如果追蹤功能已啟用，則只要原始訊息進入或離開訊息佇列伺服器，訊息佇列就會傳送報告訊息至報告佇列。If tracing is enabled, Message Queuing sends a report message to the report queue each time the original message enters or leaves a Message Queuing server. ## Examples [!code-csharp[UEMsmqMessage#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/uemsmqmessage/cs/program.cs#16)] [!code-vb[UEMsmqMessage#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/uemsmqmessage/vb/program.vb#16)]

public: property Nullable<System::Messaging::MessagePriority> Priority { Nullable<System::Messaging::MessagePriority> get(); void set(Nullable<System::Messaging::MessagePriority> value); };

span.span: Gets or sets the that is associated with this message.

value.span: 與此訊息相關聯的 。

span.span: The that is associated with this message.

value.span: 可以是 。

span.span: May be .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 訊息優先權會影響訊息佇列 (MSMQ) 在訊息於傳輸期間以及在抵達目的端佇列時的訊息處理方式。The message priority affects how Message Queuing (MSMQ) handles the message both while the message is in transit and when it reaches its destination queue. 較高優先權的訊息會在路由傳送期間獲得優先處理，並且插入較接近目的端佇列前端的位置。A message with a higher priority is given preference during routing, and is inserted closer to the front of its destination queue. 優先權相同的訊息則會根據抵達時間放置在目的端佇列中。Messages with the same priority are placed in the destination queue according to their arrival times. ## Examples [!code-csharp[UEMsmqMessage#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/uemsmqmessage/cs/program.cs#17)] [!code-vb[UEMsmqMessage#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/uemsmqmessage/vb/program.vb#17)]

value.span: 傳送應用程式會在傳送訊息至接收應用程式時指定回應佇列。

span.span: The sending application specifies the response queue when it sends messages to the receiving application.

value.span: 傳送應用程式可以指定任何可用的佇列做為回應佇列。

span.span: The sending application can specify any available queue as the response queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 訊息佇列 (MSMQ) 會將傳送應用程式的寄件人識別項附加至訊息。Message Queuing (MSMQ) attaches the sender identifier of the sending application to the message. 接收應用程式可以使用這個屬性來執行授權檢查。This property can be used by the receiving application to perform authorization checks. ## Examples [!code-csharp[UEMsmqMessage#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/uemsmqmessage/cs/program.cs#19)] [!code-vb[UEMsmqMessage#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/uemsmqmessage/vb/program.vb#19)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳送時間會調整為傳送應用程式電腦的本地時間。The sent time is adjusted to the local time of the sending application's computer. 來源和目的端佇列可能位在不同時區的電腦上。The source and destination queues may be on computers with different time zones. 這個屬性的預設值為 `null`。The default for this property is `null`. ## Examples [!code-csharp[UEMsmqMessage#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/uemsmqmessage/cs/program.cs#20)] [!code-vb[UEMsmqMessage#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/uemsmqmessage/vb/program.vb#20)]

span.span: Gets or sets a that indicates the maximum amount of time allowed for the message to reach the destination queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個屬性所指定的間隔在訊息抵達目的端佇列之前到期，訊息佇列 (MSMQ) 就會以兩種方法中的一種方法來捨棄訊息。If the interval specified by this property expires before the message reaches its destination queue, Message Queuing (MSMQ) discards the message in one of two ways. 如果訊息的 屬性是 `true`，訊息就會傳送到寄不出的信件佇列。If the message's property is `true`, the message is sent to the dead-letter queue. 否則，訊息會被捨棄。Otherwise, the message is dropped. 這個屬性的預設值為 `null`。The default for this property is `null`. ## Examples [!code-csharp[UEMsmqMessage#21](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/uemsmqmessage/cs/program.cs#21)] [!code-vb[UEMsmqMessage#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/uemsmqmessage/vb/program.vb#21)]
